explains: adj. 部门的；各县的；分科的
wordGroup: departmental budget 分部预算；分部门预算

sentences.en: Community leaders say a complete departmental shake-up is needed.
sentences.cn: 社区领导人说需要进行一次彻底的部门大改组。

sentences.en: The Secretary of Education is right to seek a bigger departmental budget.
sentences.cn: 教育部长寻求更多的部门预算是对的。

sentences.en: You should also direct your questions to your departmental office or academic adviser.
sentences.cn: 你也应该把你的问题告诉你的部门办公室或学术顾问。
